info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 8:16PM EDT until July 13 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN BERKSHIRE...NORTHEASTERN COLUMBIA AND SOUTHEASTERN RENSSELAER COUNTIES... At 816 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Pownal to near Kinderhook, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Pittsfield, Chatham, Stephentown, New Lebanon, Berlin, Valatie, Austerlitz, Hancock, Ghent, Canaan, Richmond, East Nassau, West Stephentown, Jacks Corners, North Hancock, Rayville, Riders Mills, Taborton, Center Berlin and Petersburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
